Uses of Interface
peregrine.io.InputReference

Packages that use InputReference
peregrine.io Main IO package including high level IO references. 
peregrine.io.driver Provides a way to integrate external IO into peregrine (Cassandra, MySQL, hbase, etc). 
peregrine.io.driver.blackhole IO driver for writing to nothing (AKA a blackhole). 
peregrine.io.driver.broadcast Broadcast IO driver for sending data to all nodes. 
peregrine.io.driver.example Example driver which can be used as a template for creating new drivers. 
peregrine.io.driver.file IO driver for writing to the PFS filesystem. 
peregrine.io.driver.shuffle Shuffle IO driver. 
 

Uses of InputReference in peregrine.io
 

Methods in peregrine.io that return types with arguments of type InputReference

Methods in peregrine.io with parameters of type InputReference
 Input Input.add(InputReference ref)
           
 

Uses of InputReference in peregrine.io.driver
 

Methods in peregrine.io.driver that return InputReference
 InputReference IODriver.getInputReference(java.lang.String uri)
          Parse the given URI and return an InputReference we can use.
 

Methods in peregrine.io.driver with parameters of type InputReference
 JobInput IODriver.getJobInput(Config config, Job job, InputReference inputReference, WorkReference work)
          Given a given unit of Work, and an InputReference , return a JobInput for reading key / value pairs from a job.
 java.util.Map<Host,java.util.List<Work>> IODriver.getWork(Config config, InputReference inputReference)
          Get work (input splits, partitions, etc) from the given InputReference.
 java.util.Map<Host,java.util.List<Work>> BaseIODriver.getWork(Config config, InputReference inputReference)
          Get a unit of work (input split, partition, etc) from the given string specification.
